titles.title: Ending Natural Gas Companies' Seizure of Land for Export Profits Act
Ending Natural Gas Companies' Seizure of Land for Export Profits Act
Ending Natural Gas Companies' Seizure of Land for Export Profits Act
A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to provide that the United States district courts shall not have jurisdiction to condemn property in which a State holds any interest, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
